cpcv_snapshot_name_error: Please give a valid name to your backup.
cpcv_snapshot_name_length_error: Please choose a shorter name for your backup.
cpcv_snapshot_creation_error: Oops! An error has occurred backing up the volume.
cpcv_snapshot_error: An error has occurred retrieving backup information, please try again later.
cpcv_snapshot_attach_warning: Your disk is currently attached to an instance. To ensure the integrity of your data, we advise detaching the disk before you perform a backup.
cpc_volume_empty: You do not have any additional disks (volumes).
cpc_volume_error: Oops! We were unable to retrieve the list of volumes.
cpc_volume_create_volume_button_info: You will be redirected. The hard disk addition interface is currently loading.
cpc_volume_delete_success: This volume is no longer available.
cpc_volume_delete_error: Oops! We were unable to delete this volume.
